scan_script_only_check.description: The glide property "glide.basicauth.required.xsd" controls whether authentication is required in order to make a XSD request to an instance. If "glide.basicauth.required.xsd" is not set to the recommended value of "true", then authentication is disabled for XSD requests on the instance. It allows unauthenticated access to XSD processor leaking sensitive information.
scan_script_only_check.name: Authorization for inbound XSD Requests is not enabled
scan_script_only_check.resolution_details: Ensure the property "glide.basicauth.required.xsd" is set to "true".
scan_script_only_check.short_description: Authorization for inbound XSD Requests is not enabled
scan_script_only_check.sys_name: Authorization for inbound XSD Requests is not enabled
